Opt.sql: select * from His.用户表

select a.*,PRICENAME,名称 as DEPTName from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE a ,LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE b , HIS.科室表 ks where a.choscode =? [Condition] and a.PRICEID=b.PRICEID and a.DEPTID=ks.ID and a.choscode =b.choscode order by warecode asc
select * from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE
select 名称 from HIS.科室表 t where ID=?
select DEPTID from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where choscode=? and WARECODE=?
select 名称,ID,类别,代码 as 拼音码,上级科室,级别,农合名称 from HIS.科室表 where choscode= ? and (ID like ? or 名称 like ? or 代码 like ?)

select PRICENAME,PRICEID,PYCODE,WBCODE,RATE,IFALL from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE where choscode=? and IFUSE=1 and (PRICEID like ? or PRICENAME like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?)) order by PRICEID
select PRICENAME from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE where PRICEID=?
select PRICEID from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where choscode=? and WARECODE=?

select choscode, chosname, hosaddress, helpcode, managername, telphone, registdate, isineffect, parenthoscode, iswsj, licence, zlxjlb, ykms, areacode, supercode ,corpaccount, nhhospcode, xcode, zcode, ccode, jdcode, note, attributevalue, jgkind from HIS.SYSDICTHOSPITAL
select ifall from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where choscode=? and warecode=?
select KINDNAME,KINDCODE,PYCODE,WBCODE,IFEND,MEMO from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where choscode=? and (KINDCODE like ? or KINDNAME like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))
select KINDNAME,KINDCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where choscode=? order by KINDCODE

select distinct b.KINDNAME as KINDNAME ,a.KINDCODE as KINDCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL a ,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND b where a.choscode=? and a.warecode=? and a.KINDCODE=b.KINDCODE and a.choscode=b.choscode order by KINDCODE

(select KINDNAME,KINDCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND where choscode=? ) minus (select distinct b.KINDNAME as KINDNAME ,a.KINDCODE as KINDCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL a ,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND b where a.choscode=? and a.warecode=? and a.KINDCODE=b.KINDCODE and a.choscode=b.choscode) order by KINDCODE
select count(*) from LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL where warecode=? and choscode=?

select distinct a.KINDCODE,a.SUPERCODE,KINDNAME,a.MEMO,a.CHOSCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZKIND a ,LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL b where a.CHOSCODE=b.CHOSCODE and a.KINDCODE=b.KINDCODE and b.CHOSCODE=? and b.WARECODE=?
delete from LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL where WARECODE=? and CHOSCODE=? and KINDCODE=?
delete from LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL where WARECODE=? and CHOSCODE=?
select count(a.*) from LKWZ.WZSTOCK a,LKWZ.DICTWZ b where a.WZID=b.WZID and a.NUM >0 and b.KINDCODE like concat(?,'%') and a.WARECODE=?
select count(*) from LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL where warecode=? and choscode=? and kindcode=?
select count(*) from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where choscode=? and warename=?
select count(*) from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where choscode=? and warecode!=? and warename=?
select max(to_number(warecode)) from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where choscode=?
delete from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where choscode=? and warecode=?
select * from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE where CHOSCODE=? [Condition] order by PRICEID asc
select count(*) from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE where CHOSCODE=? and PRICENAME=?
select count(*) from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE where PRICENAME=? and PRICEID !=? and CHOSCODE=?

Opt.sucMsg: 成功删除计价体系信息！
Opt.sql: delete from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE where PRICEID=?
select * from HIS.字典表 where DICGRPID=301 [Condition] order by DICID
select * from HIS.字典表 where DICGRPID=301 order by DICID
select count(*) from HIS.字典表 where DICGRPID=? and DICDESC =? and DICID !=?
select count(*) from HIS.字典表 where DICGRPID=? and DICDESC =?
select max(to_number(DICID)) from HIS.字典表 where DICGRPID=301
select count(*) from LKWZ.DICTWZ where UNITCODE=? or LSUNITCODE=?
delete from HIS.字典表 where DICGRPID=? and DICID=?
select count(*) from HIS.字典表 where DICGRPID=? and DEFVALUE=1
UPDATE HIS.字典表 set DEFVALUE=0 where DICGRPID=? and DICID!=?
select * from LKWZ.WZPLANMAIN where IFPLAN=1 and cHosCode=? and WARECODE=? and PLANDATE >= ? and PLANDATE <= ? order by PLANID
select count(*) as mxbs from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL where PLANID=? and cHosCode=?

select distinct wz.GG, a.*,wz.WZNAME,wz.PRICE as wzPRICE,wz.UNITCODE as wzUNITCODE,wz.LSUNITCODE,wz.CHANGERATE,wz.RATE,wz.LOWNUM,wz.HIGHNUM,wz.VALIDE,zd.DICDESC,t.KINDNAME from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL a, LKWZ.DICTWZ wz,HIS.字典表 zd,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND t where a.planid=? and a.choscode=? and a.choscode= wz.choscode and (a.wzid=wz.wzid) and (a.UNITCODE=zd.DICID and zd.DICGRPID=301) and wz.KINDCODE=t.KINDCODE order by rowno

select wz.GG,a.WZID,a.UNITCODE,a.NUM,a.PRICE,a.MONEY,a.LSPRICE,a.LSMONEY,a.MEMO,a.TXM ,wz.WZNAME,wz.PRICE as wzPRICE, wz.UNITCODE as wzUNITCODE,wz.LSUNITCODE,wz.CHANGERATE,wz.RATE,wz.LOWNUM,wz.HIGHNUM,zd.DICDESC from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL a, LKWZ.DICTWZ wz,HIS.字典表 zd where a.choscode=? and a.choscode= wz.choscode and (a.wzid=wz.wzid) and (a.UNITCODE=zd.DICID and zd.DICGRPID=301) order by rowno

select distinct stock.WZID,wz.LSUNITCODE as UNITCODE,(stock.NUMXX-stock.NUM) as num,wz.WZNAME,wz.PRICE as PRICE,wz.PRICE as wzPRICE,wz.TXM, wz.UNITCODE as wzUNITCODE,wz.LSUNITCODE,wz.CHANGERATE,wz.RATE,wz.LOWNUM,wz.HIGHNUM,wz.GG from LKWZ.WZSTOCK stock, LKWZ.DICTWZ wz where stock.CHOSCODE=? and stock.WARECODE=? and stock.NUM<stock.NUMXX and wz.WZID=stock.WZID
select WARECODE,WARENAME from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where IFSTWARE=1 and CHOSCODE=? and (WARECODE like ? or WARENAME like ? )
select count(*) n from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL where PLANID=?
select * from LKWZ.WZPLANMAIN where IFPLAN=1 and STATUS=1 and cHosCode=? and PLANDATE >= ? and PLANDATE <= ? order by PLANID
select * from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE=? and IFUSE=1 and (WZID like ? or WZNAME like ?)
select SUPPLYNAME,SUPPLYID from LKWZ.DICTWZDETAIL where WZID=? and(SUPPLYNAME like ? or SUPPLYID like ?)
select UNITCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZ where wzid=?
select dicdesc from HIS.字典表 where dicid=? and DICGRPID=301
select LSUNITCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZ where wzid=?
select TXM from LKWZ.DICTWZ where wzid=?
select PRICE from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE=? and wzid=?
select CHANGERATE from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE=? and wzid=?
select a.IFALL from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE a,LKWZ.DICTWZWARE b where (a.PRICEID=b.PRICEID and b.WARECODE=? and b.CHOSCODE=?)
select RATE from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE=? and wzid=?
select a.RATE from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE a,LKWZ.DICTWZWARE b where a.PRICEID=b.PRICEID and (b.CHOSCODE =? and b.WARECODE=?)
select ROWNO from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL where PLANID=? order by ROWNO desc
select sum(MONEY) from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL where PLANID=?
select DICDESC,DICID from HIS.字典表 where DICID=(select UNITCODE from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL where PLANID=? and ROWNO=?) and DICGRPID=301
delete from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL where PLANID=? and ROWNO=?
select a.* from LKWZ.WZINMAIN a where a.OPFLAG=0 and a.cHosCode=? and a.STATUS =? and a.WARECODE =? and a.INDATE >= ? and a.INDATE <= ? order by a.INID
select count(*) as mxbs from LKWZ.WZINDETAIL where INID=? and cHosCode=?

select distinct a.*,wz.WZNAME,wz.PRICE as wzPRICE,wz.UNITCODE as wzUNITCODE,wz.LSUNITCODE,wz.CHANGERATE,wz.RATE,wz.LOWNUM,wz.HIGHNUM,zd.DICDESC,wz.GG,t.KINDNAME from LKWZ.WZINDETAIL a,LKWZ.DICTWZ wz,HIS.字典表 zd, LKWZ.DICTWZKIND t where a.INID=? and a.CHOSCODE=? and a.choscode= wz.choscode and a.choscode= t.choscode and a.WZID=wz.WZID and (a.UNITCODE=zd.DICID and zd.DICGRPID=301) and t.KINDCODE=wz.KINDCODE t.CHOSCODE=wz.CHOSCODE order by INID

select IONAME as 入库方式,IOID as 入库方式编码 from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IFUSE=1 and IOFLAG=0 and USEST=1 and OPFLAG=0 and CHOSCODE=? and (IONAME like ? or IOID like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))order by IONAME

select WARENAME as 入库库房,WARECODE as 入库库房编码 from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where IFUSE=1 and IFSTWARE=1 and CHOSCODE=? and (WARENAME like ? or WARECODE like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?) )order by WARENAME
select IONAME,IOID from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IFUSE=1 and IOFLAG=0 and USEST=1 and OPFLAG=0 and CHOSCODE=? and IOID=? order by IONAME
select WARENAME,WARECODE from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where IFUSE=1 and IFSTWARE=1 and CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=? order by WARENAME
select SUPPLYNAME,SUPPLYID from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where IFUSE=1 and (SUPPLYNAME like ? or SUPPLYID like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?)) order by SUPPLYNAME
select a.PLANID from LKWZ.WZPLANMAIN a,LKWZ.WZINMAIN b where a.WARECODE=b.WARECODE and a.STATUS=2 and b.CHOSCODE=? and b.WARECODE=?

select a.WZID,a.UNITCODE,a.NUM,a.PRICE,a.MONEY,a.LSPRICE,a.LSMONEY,a.MEMO,a.TXM ,a.PLANID,wz.WZNAME,wz.PRICE as wzPRICE, wz.UNITCODE as wzUNITCODE,wz.LSUNITCODE,wz.CHANGERATE,wz.RATE,wz.LOWNUM,wz.HIGHNUM, wz.GG,zd.DICDESC from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL a, LKWZ.DICTWZ wz,HIS.字典表 zd from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL a,LKWZ.WZPLANMAIN b where a.PLANID=b.PLANID and b.CHOSCODE=? and b.WARECODE=? and b.STATUS=2 and (a.wzid=wz.wzid) and (a.UNITCODE=zd.DICID and zd.DICGRPID=301)
(select * from LKWZ.WZPLANMAIN where CHOSCODE=? and WARECODE=? and status=2 ) minus (select a.* from LKWZ.WZPLANMAIN a,LKWZ.WZINMAIN b where a.PLANID=b.PLANNO)
select * from LKWZ.WZPLANDETAIL where PLANID=?
select count(*) n from LKWZ.WZINDETAIL where INID=?
select OPFLAG from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IOID=?
select * from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IOID=?
select count(RECIPECODE) from LKWZ.WZINMAIN where RECIPECODE like ?
select count(RECIPECODE) from LKWZ.WZOUTMAIN where RECIPECODE like ?
select IFALL from lkwz.dictwzware where WARECODE=?

select distinct a.WZNAME as 物资,a.UNITCODE as 单位编码,a.PRICE as 采购单价0,a.LSUNITCODE as 最小单位编码,a.CHANGERATE as 换算系数,a.LOWNUM as 最低库存量,a.HIGHNUM as 最高库存量,a.VALIDE as 有效期0,a.RATE as 加价率,a.TXM as 条形码,c.DICDESC as 单位0 ,a.GG as 规格, a.WZID as 物资ID,t.KINDNAME as 物资类别 from LKWZ.DICTWZ a,LKWZ.DICTWZWARE b,HIS.字典表 c,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND t where a.CHOSCODE=? and (a.CHOSCODE=b.CHOSCODE and a.CHOSCODE=t.CHOSCODE and b.WARECODE=? and b.IFALL=1) and (a.WZNAME like ? or a.WZID like ? or upper(a.PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(a.WBCODE) like upper(?)) and (c.DICGRPID=301 and c.DICID=a.UNITCODE ) and a.KINDCODE=t.KINDCODE

select distinct a.WZNAME as 物资,a.UNITCODE as 单位编码,c.DICDESC as 单位0,a.PRICE as 采购单价0,a.LSUNITCODE as 最小单位编码,a.CHANGERATE as 换算系数,a.LOWNUM as 最低库存量,a.HIGHNUM as 最高库存量,a.VALIDE as 有效期0,a.RATE as 加价率,a.TXM as 条形码 ,a.GG as 规格 ,a.WZID as 物资ID,t.KINDNAME as 物资类别 from LKWZ.DICTWZ a,LKWZ.DICTWZWAREDETAIL b,HIS.字典表 c,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND t where a.CHOSCODE=? and a.KINDCODE like concat(b.kindcode,'%') and a.CHOSCODE=b.CHOSCODE and a.CHOSCODE=t.CHOSCODE and b.WARECODE=? and (a.WZNAME like ? or a.WZID like ? or upper(a.PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(a.WBCODE) like upper(?)) and (c.DICGRPID=301 and c.DICID=a.UNITCODE ) and a.KINDCODE=t.KINDCODE
select WZNAME from LKWZ.DICTWZ where WZID=?

select a.DICDESC as 单位,a.DICID as 单位编码 from HIS.字典表 a,LKWZ.DICTWZ b where a.DICGRPID=301 and (a.DICID=b.UNITCODE or a.DICID=b.LSUNITCODE) and b.CHOSCODE=? and b.WZID=? and (a.DICID like ? or a.DICDESC like ? or upper(a.PYCODE) like upper(?))
select distinct a.DICID,a.DICDESC from HIS.字典表 a,LKWZ.DICTWZ b where a.DICGRPID=301
select b.IFALL from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE a,LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE b where a.PRICEID=b.PRICEID and a.CHOSCODE=? and a.WARECODE=? and a.CHOSCODE=b.CHOSCODE
select RATE from LKWZ.DICTWZPRICE where PRICEID=?
select LSUNITCODE from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE=? and WZID=?

select SUPPLYID as 生产厂家ID,SUPPLYNAME as 生产厂家 from LKWZ.DICTWZSUPPLY where IFFACTORY=1 and (CHOSCODE = 0 or CHOSCODE = ? ) and (SUPPLYID like ? or SUPPLYNAME like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))
delete from LKWZ.WZINDETAIL where DETAILNO=?
select INID from LKWZ.WZINDETAIL where DETAILNO=?
select * from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE = ? and WZID=?
select VALIDE from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE = ? and WZID=?
select * from LKWZ.DICTWZ where CHOSCODE = ? and WZID=?
select * from LKWZ.WZSTOCK where STOCKID=? and WZID=?
select * from LKWZ.WZSTOCK where CHOSCODE=? and WZID=? and WARECODE=?
select STOCKID from LKWZ.WZSTOCK where CHOSCODE=? and WZID=? and WARECODE=?
select NUM from LKWZ.WZSTOCK where CHOSCODE=? and WZID=? and WARECODE=?
select NUMSX from LKWZ.WZSTOCK where CHOSCODE=? and WZID=? and WARECODE=?
select OUTNUM from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
select * from LKWZ.WZSTOCK where CHOSCODE =? and WZID=? and WARECODE=?
select * from LKWZ.WZINDETAIL where DETAILNO=?
select * from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
select * from LKWZ.WZOUTMAIN where OPFLAG=0 and cHosCode=? and STATUS =? and WARECODE =? and OUTDATE >= ? and OUTDATE <= ? order by OUTID
select count(*) as mxbs from LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL where OUTID=? and cHosCode=?

select distinct a.* ,wz.GG,wz.WZNAME, wz.UNITCODE as wzUNITCODE,wz.LSUNITCODE,wz.CHANGERATE,wz.RATE ,(s.NUM-s.OUTNUM) as flnum,s.PRICE as PRICE0,s.LSPRICE,t.KINDNAME from LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL a,LKWZ.DICTWZ wz,LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL s,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND t where OUTID=? and a.cHosCode=? and a.CHOSCODE=t.CHOSCODE and a.CHOSCODE=wz.CHOSCODE and a.CHOSCODE=s.CHOSCODE and a.WZID=wz.WZID and a.STOCKFLOWNO=s.FLOWNO and wz.KINDCODE=t.KINDCODE order by OUTID

select IONAME as 出库方式,IOID as 出库方式编码 from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IFUSE=1 and IOFLAG=1 and USEST=1 and OPFLAG=0 and CHOSCODE=? and (IONAME like ? or IOID like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))order by IONAME

select WARENAME as 出库库房,WARECODE as 出库库房编码 from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where IFUSE=1 and CHOSCODE=? and (WARENAME like ? or WARECODE like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?) )order by WARENAME
select IONAME,IOID from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IFUSE=1 and IOFLAG=1 and USEST=1 and OPFLAG=0 and CHOSCODE=? and IOID=? order by IONAME
select SYSVALUE from HIS.系统参数 where id=2103 and CHOSCODE=?
select count(*) n from LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL where OUTID=?

(select distinct s.FLOWNO as 库存流水号, a.WZNAME as 物资,a.UNITCODE as 物资单位 ,a.LSUNITCODE as 最小单位,a.GG as 规格,s.WZID as 物资ID, (s.NUM-s.OUTNUM) as 库存剩余量,s.CHANGERATE as 换算系数,s.LSUNITCODE as 单位,s.PRICE as 入库单价,s.PRICE as 入库单价0,s.LSPRICE as 出库单价,s.LSPRICE as 出库单价0,s.PH as 生产批号, s.PZWH as 批准文号,s.SUPPLYID as 生产厂家ID,s.SUPPLYNAME as 生产厂家名称,s.PRODUCTDATE as 生产日期,s.VALIDDATE as 有效期,s.WSXKZH as 卫生许可证号, s.MEMO as 备注,s.TXM as 条形码,m.KINDNAME as 物资类别 from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL s,LKWZ.DICTWZ a,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND m where s.WZID=a.WZID and s.WARECODE=? and s.CHOSCODE=a.CHOSCODE and s.CHOSCODE=m.CHOSCODE and s.CHOSCODE=? and m.KINDCODE=a.KINDCODE and (s.NUM-s.OUTNUM)>0 ) minus (select distinct s.FLOWNO as 库存流水号, a.WZNAME as 物资,a.UNITCODE as 物资单位 ,a.LSUNITCODE as 最小单位,a.GG as 规格,s.WZID as 物资ID,(s.NUM-s.OUTNUM) as 库存剩余量,s.CHANGERATE as 换算系数,s.LSUNITCODE as 单位,s.PRICE as 入库单价,s.PRICE as 入库单价0,s.LSPRICE as 出库单价,s.LSPRICE as 出库单价0,s.PH as 生产批号, s.PZWH as 批准文号,s.SUPPLYID as 生产厂家ID,s.SUPPLYNAME as 生产厂家名称,s.PRODUCTDATE as 生产日期,s.VALIDDATE as 有效期,s.WSXKZH as 卫生许可证号, s.MEMO as 备注,s.TXM as 条形码,m.KINDNAME as 物资类别 from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL s,LKWZ.DICTWZ a,LKWZ.WZOUTMAIN t,LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL z ,LKWZ.DICTWZKIND m where s.WARECODE=? and s.CHOSCODE=? and s.CHOSCODE=a.CHOSCODE and s.CHOSCODE=m.CHOSCODE and (s.NUM-s.OUTNUM)>0 and m.KINDCODE=a.KINDCODE and (t.OUTID=z.OUTID and (t.STATUS=1 or t.STATUS=2) and z.STOCKFLOWNO=s.FLOWNO))
select OUTID from LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL where DETAILNO=?

select a.GG,b.FLOWNO, a.WZNAME, b.num ,b.OUTNUM,b.lsunitcode ,b.changerate ,b.price ,b.lsprice ,b.ph ,b.pzwh , b.supplyid ,b.supplyname,b.productdate ,b.validdate,b.wsxkzh ,b.memo,b.txm,b.recipecode,b.indate ,b.choscode from LKWZ.DICTWZ a,LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL b where (a.WZID= b.WZID and a.CHOSCODE=b.CHOSCODE and b.STOCKID=? and b.WARECODE=? and (b.num-b.OUTNUM)>0 ) and (b.FLOWNO like ? or b.supplyname like ?)order by a.WZNAME
select PRICE from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
select LSPRICE from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
select MEMO from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
select CHANGERATE from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
select NUM from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
select OUTNUM from LKWZ.WZSTOCKDETAIL where FLOWNO=?
delete from LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL where DETAILNO=?
select WARENAME as 库房名称,WARECODE as 库房编码 from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where CHOSCODE=? and (WARENAME like ? or WARECODE like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))order by WARENAME

select IONAME as 入库方式,IOID 入库方式ID from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IFUSE=1 and IOFlag=0 and CHOSCODE=? and (IONAME like ? or IOID like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))order by IONAME

select a.*,b.IONAME,c.WARENAME from LKWZ.WZINMAIN a,LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT b,LKWZ.DICTWZWARE c where (a.cHosCode=? and a.WARECODE=? and a.STATUS=6 and a.INDATE >= ? and a.INDATE <= ? ) and a.CHOSCODE=b.CHOSCODE and a.CHOSCODE=c.CHOSCODE and a.IOID=b.IOID and a.WARECODE=c.WARECODE [Condition] order by INID

select a.* ,wz.WZNAME,zd.DICDESC from LKWZ.WZINDETAIL a, LKWZ.DICTWZ wz, HIS.字典表 zd where a.INID=? and a.cHosCode=? and a.CHOSCODE=wz.CHOSCODE and a.WZID=wz.WZID and (a.UNITCODE=zd.DICID and zd.DICGRPID=301) order by INID

select WARENAME as 出库库房,WARECODE as 出库库房编码 from LKWZ.DICTWZWARE where CHOSCODE=? and (WARENAME like ? or WARECODE like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))order by WARENAME

select IONAME as 出库方式,IOID as 出库方式编码 from LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT where IFUSE=1 and IOFlag=1 and CHOSCODE=? and (IONAME like ? or IOID like ? or upper(PYCODE) like upper(?) or upper(WBCODE) like upper(?))order by IONAME

select a.* ,b.IONAME,c.WARENAME from LKWZ.WZOUTMAIN a ,LKWZ.DICTWZINOUT b,LKWZ.DICTWZWARE c where (a.cHosCode=? and a.WARECODE=? and a.STATUS=6 and a.OUTDATE >= ? and a.OUTDATE <= ? ) and a.CHOSCODE=b.CHOSCODE and a.CHOSCODE=c.CHOSCODE and a.IOID=b.IOID and a.WARECODE=c.WARECODE [Condition] order by OUTID

select a.* ,wz.WZNAME,zd.DICDESC from LKWZ.WZOUTDETAIL a , LKWZ.DICTWZ wz, HIS.字典表 zd where a.OUTID=? and a.cHosCode=? and a.CHOSCODE=wz.CHOSCODE and a.WZID=wz.WZID and (a.UNITCODE=zd.DICID and zd.DICGRPID=301) order by OUTID
